io.netty.handler.codec

类 LengthFieldPrepender

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter
      • io.netty.channel.ChannelOutboundHandlerAdapter
        • io.netty.handler.codec.MessageToMessageEncoder<ByteBuf>
          • io.netty.handler.codec.LengthFieldPrepender
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ChannelHandler, ChannelOutboundHandler

    @ChannelHandler.Sharable
public class LengthFieldPrepender
extends MessageToMessageEncoder<ByteBuf>
    An encoder that prepends the length of the message. The length value is prepended as a binary form.

    For example, LengthFieldPrepender(2) will encode the following 12-bytes string: 

     +----------------+
 | "HELLO, WORLD" |
 +----------------+
    into the following: 
     +--------+----------------+
 + 0x000C | "HELLO, WORLD" |
 +--------+----------------+
    If you turned on the lengthIncludesLengthFieldLength flag in the constructor, the encoded data would look like the following (12 (original data) + 2 (prepended data) = 14 (0xE)): 
     +--------+----------------+
 + 0x000E | "HELLO, WORLD" |
 +--------+----------------+

    • 构造器详细资料

      • LengthFieldPrepender

        public LengthFieldPrepender(int lengthFieldLength)
        Creates a new instance.
        参数:
        lengthFieldLength - the length of the prepended length field. Only 1, 2, 3, 4, and 8 are allowed.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - if lengthFieldLength is not 1, 2, 3, 4, or 8

      • LengthFieldPrepender

        public LengthFieldPrepender(int lengthFieldLength,
                            boolean lengthIncludesLengthFieldLength)
        Creates a new instance.
        参数:
        lengthFieldLength - the length of the prepended length field. Only 1, 2, 3, 4, and 8 are allowed.
        lengthIncludesLengthFieldLength - if true, the length of the prepended length field is added to the value of the prepended length field.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - if lengthFieldLength is not 1, 2, 3, 4, or 8

      • LengthFieldPrepender

        public LengthFieldPrepender(int lengthFieldLength,
                            int lengthAdjustment)
        Creates a new instance.
        参数:
        lengthFieldLength - the length of the prepended length field. Only 1, 2, 3, 4, and 8 are allowed.
        lengthAdjustment - the compensation value to add to the value of the length field
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - if lengthFieldLength is not 1, 2, 3, 4, or 8

      • LengthFieldPrepender

        public LengthFieldPrepender(int lengthFieldLength,
                            int lengthAdjustment,
                            boolean lengthIncludesLengthFieldLength)
        Creates a new instance.
        参数:
        lengthFieldLength - the length of the prepended length field. Only 1, 2, 3, 4, and 8 are allowed.
        lengthAdjustment - the compensation value to add to the value of the length field
        lengthIncludesLengthFieldLength - if true, the length of the prepended length field is added to the value of the prepended length field.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - if lengthFieldLength is not 1, 2, 3, 4, or 8

      • LengthFieldPrepender

        public LengthFieldPrepender(ByteOrder byteOrder,
                            int lengthFieldLength,
                            int lengthAdjustment,
                            boolean lengthIncludesLengthFieldLength)
        Creates a new instance.
        参数:
        byteOrder - the ByteOrder of the length field
        lengthFieldLength - the length of the prepended length field. Only 1, 2, 3, 4, and 8 are allowed.
        lengthAdjustment - the compensation value to add to the value of the length field
        lengthIncludesLengthFieldLength - if true, the length of the prepended length field is added to the value of the prepended length field.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - if lengthFieldLength is not 1, 2, 3, 4, or 8

    • 方法详细资料

      • encode

        protected void encode(ChannelHandlerContext ctx,
                      ByteBuf msg,
                      List<Object> out)
               throws Exception
        从类复制的说明: MessageToMessageEncoder
        Encode from one message to an other. This method will be called for each written message that can be handled by this encoder.
        指定者:
        encode 在类中 MessageToMessageEncoder<ByteBuf>
        参数:
        ctx - the ChannelHandlerContext which this MessageToMessageEncoder belongs to
        msg - the message to encode to an other one
        out - the List into which the encoded msg should be added needs to do some kind of aggregation
        抛出:
        Exception - is thrown if an error occurs
